name: Inspection of lead acid battery facilities
text: §342I-3  Inspection of lead acid battery facilities.  The department of health shall produce, print, and distribute the notices required by section 342I-2 to all places where lead acid batteries are offered for sale at retail.  In performing its duties under this part, the department may inspect any place, building, or premise governed by this part.  Authorized employees of the agency may issue warnings and citations to persons who fail to comply with the requirement of this part. [L 1989, c 281, pt of §1; am L 1991, c 201, §3]
